system.effect: A paralyzed target’s Initiative is halved. Make a Save Check that succeeds on 11+ at start of the target’s turn. On a successful check the target may act normally, but on a failed check the following effects occur:  - The target can only take a Standard OR Shift Action that round, but not both.  - The target is Vulnerable for 1 full round. - The target cannot take attacks of opportunity for 1 full round.
